title: Co-botic
description:
Co-botic App is your home's intelligent hardware management platform. With the Co-botic App, you can complete the convenient and fast interaction between the mobile phone and the intelligent hardware, and realized the interconnection between the smart devices.
You and the smart life, only a distance from the Co-botic App.
Linked control, easy to use
Quickly grasp the addition and operation of devices to achieve interoperability between smart devices.
Personalized customization, as you like
Set up a personalized smart scene according to your own usage habits
Device sharing, fun to pass
Sharing equipment for family and friends, sharing the fun of technology.
Enjoy Co-botic App, Love Co-botic App
